tei:classSpec.tei:gloss: lower and upper clipping value attribute class
tei:classSpec.tei:desc: This attribute class provides attributes clip.lower and clip.upper. They are used to clip the range of random values.

tei:attDef.tei:desc: defines the lowest clipping border. If random values get below this they will be set to this value.
defines the highest clipping border. Random values greater than this will be set to this value.
